= Introduction =

This page has operating instructions for the MSX core.
This core is based on OneChipMSX

= Links =
  * 

= Installation =

The core requires a few files to function. You will find detailed instruction in the core's homepage.

You can also download the MSX Starter Pack to extract on a blank SD card formatted in FAT16.

== Notes ==

  * PAL video mode is 720x576p 50hz 
  * NTSC video mode is 720x481p 60hz
  * TV video mode is 720x240p 60hz (works best with UMSA+XRGB-Mini)
